txt.en: 'With that green lamp, you can see the dwarf-doors hidden in this region of Moria. My notes show that the door to a vault named Menem-nar should be one somewhere to South, near the centre of the Silvertine Lodes.'
'I do not know quite yet what is held within Menem-nar. I have dispatched scouts, but they have not yet reported back. I have no doubt though that we shall discover a great wealth.'
'I wish I could tell you more about where it is, but the old maps are quite vague.'
HIDING CONTENT - DNT - Dwarven Doors: Menem-nar
Styrr has rebuilt an ancient green dwarf-lamp for you. He told you that this lamp will show you the door to Menem-nar in the Silvertine Lodes.
The hidden door of Menem-nar is believed to be somewhere in the centre of the Silvertine Lodes.\n\nStyrr has asked you to search for the hidden dwarf-door.
Talk to Styrr at the Deep Descent
Styrr can be found at the Deep Descent within the Silvertine Lodes.\n\nYou should return to Styrr tell him you have located the hidden door to Menem-nar.
